quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has signed an MoU with the Central TB Division (CTD), Ministry of Health and Family Welfare and which of the following state(s) to support in TB (Tuberculosis) elimination by undertaking intensified TB elimination project?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Chhattisgarh
Madhya Pradesh
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister for State of Health & Family Welfare has briefed about National Quality Assurance Standards (NQAS). NQAS has been launched for which of the following health facilities?
options: Primary cared public health facilities
Secondary cared public health facilities
Tertiary cared public health facilities
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Revised National TB Control Programme (RNTCP) was launched in which of the following years?
options: 1995
1999
1997
2001
2004

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Defence has shared information about New Sainik Schools in Partnership Mode. The Government aims to set up 100 new Sainik Schools in partnership mode with which of the following entities?

A.     Non-Government Organizations

B.      Private Schools

C.      State Government Schools in states
options: A and B
C only
B and C
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), Atal Innovation Mission (AIM) under NITI Aayog has launched the ‘ATL Marathon 2022-23’. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ATL Marathon 2022-23?

A.     Indian students from class VI to XII, from ATL schools only are eligible to participate.

B.      Its objective is to provide an innovation challenge for young innovators of schools.

C.      Problem statements have been derived from G20’s global relevant issues.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the President of India has launched the EV-Yatra Portal & Mobile App on the occasion of the National Energy Conservation Day. It has been developed by which of the following entities?
options: Ministry of Heavy Industries
Bureau of Energy Efficiency
National Informatics Centre
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), 5th edition of Youth Co: Lab India 2022-23 for Young Entrepreneurs has been launched by which of the following entities?
options: Atal Innovation Mission (AIM), NITI Aayog
UNDP India
Citi Foundation
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Cabinet, headed by the Prime Minister, approved the revision of pension of Armed Forces Pensioners/Family Pensioners under One Rank One Pension, applicable from ___________.
options: 01 July, 2020.
01 July, 2019
01 July, 2021
01 July, 2018.
None of the above

quiz.text: What will be the approximate estimated additional annual expenditure for implementation of the revision?
options: Rs 12,450 crore @31% Dearness Relief
Rs 8,450 crore @21% Dearness Relief
Rs 6,450 crore @31% Dearness Relief
Rs 8,450 crore @12% Dearness Relief
Rs 8,450 crore @31% Dearness Relief

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment has shared that the registration/Diagnostics/Treatment fee will be waived off for Divyangjan from 1st January, 2023 for all eligible people. People with what percentage of disability are eligible for the fee waiver?
options: 50% and more
40% and more
75% and more
80% and more
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Electronics and Information Technology has shared information regarding Digital Security of Citizens. Which of the following section of IT Act, 2000 deals with the ‘Publishing or transmission of obscene material in electronic form’?
options: Section 66C
Section 65
Section 67
Section 77B
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, what is the duration of the National Geospatial Policy, 2022?
options: 10 years
13 years
8 years
15 years
25 years

quiz.text: National Geospatial Policy 2022 aims to develop a high resolution, accurate bathymetric geospatial data (resources and economy of inland waters, and sea surface topography of shallow and deep seas) to support India’s ‘Blue Economy’ by which of the following years?
options: 2025
2027
2030
2035
2033

options: publishers of sports magazines
publishers of children’s books
publishers of engineering books
publishers of news and current affairs

options: Bosnia

Austria

quiz.text: As per figures from Ministry of Finance, India's external debt stood at __________ in the second quarter of 2022-23, down by $2.3 billion from end-June 2022.
options: USD 610.5 billion
USD 510.5 billion
USD 590.5 billion
USD 600.5 billion

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), City Finance Rankings 2022 has been launched by the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs to support India’s Urban Rejuvenation journey. Accordingly, rankings will happen in four categories. Which of the following categories is/are incorrectly mentioned?

A.     Above 4 million

B.      Between 1-4 million

C.      Less than 100,000 population
options: A only
A and B
C only
A and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the data on textile exports & textile exports target were highlighted during the Winter Session of the Parliament. The Government of India has set a target to achieve ___________ exports for textile products by 2030.
